explains: adv. 熟练地；灵巧地；敏捷地

sentences.en: She deftly wove the flowers into a garland.
sentences.cn: 她灵巧地把花编成了一个花环。

sentences.en: It was wonderful to watch her fingers moving deftly and unerringly.
sentences.cn: 看着她的手指灵巧又不出错地移动是很美妙的。

sentences.en: He picked each lock deftly, and rifled the papers within each drawer.
sentences.cn: 他熟练地撬开每一把锁，偷走了每个抽屉里的文件。
